function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low-cost options for preventing viral transmission","Impact":"Potential for ineffective prevention of viral transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional, more effective prevention measures","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C light systems","People":"Indoor workforce, public","Owner":"Workplace management, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Observational nature of included studies","Impact":"Weakness in findings and recommendations","Mitigation":"Conducting more experimental studies for higher-quality evidence","Technologies":"Laboratory facilities, controlled experimental settings","People":"Researchers, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in designing and carrying out experimental studies in emergency settings","Impact":"Limited availability of high-quality evidence","Mitigation":"Investing in emergency research infrastructure and preparedness","Technologies":"Emergency research facilities, rapid response research teams","People":"Research community, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"}]}
